column4: okay I got my ubuntu working, now I just need to edit the grub file so it recognizes my other operating systems
my situation is a bit more complicated
do you need help, or do you have it?  keep in mind editing grub.cfg isn't recommended because your changes won't "hold" with future updates to grub.
I have a C:/win7 partition with a wubi OS on D:/ that arent coming up
I actually should ask this in #windows or something
Ahh, I've never messed with wubi.
no problem I will just edit boot.ini in XP :)
I do have win7 on this machine though, and that was automatically picked up by grub2
wubi uses the windows bootloader and than boots grub I think
I just need to figure out what to put in boot.ini heh
messing with windows files (ini) isn't my specialty but I'm sure it can't be *that* hard
no I can figure out the windows 7 part thats not too hard, but I need to find out where wubi boots from
https://wiki.ubuntu.com/WubiGuide#What%20happens%20if%20I%20have%20another%20bootloader? that might give you somewhere to start
but you'll feel like the man when you get it
yeah it will be most worth it
